item.title: About Me
item.author: adrian@ardizza.xyz (Adrian Ardizza)
item.description: Who am I? My name is Adrian Ardizza. I am a web developer and currently a first-year student at FASILKOM UI. My hobbies are mostly programming and gaming with some forays into music (specifically guitar). Organizational Experience Former President of the N3TS ICT Club (2019-2020) - SMA Negeri 3 Kota Tangerang Selatan Academic History: SDN Menteng 02 Pagi (2008-2011) SD Islam Terpadu Auliya Bintaro (2011-2014) SMP Islam Terpadu Cikal Harapan BSD (2014-2017) SMA Negeri 3 Kota Tangerang Selatan (2017-2020) Ilmu Komputer - FASILKOM Universitas Indonesia (2020-)
